doc.title: Aunt Sallie's Wonderful Bustle
doc.plot: A sudden gust of wind sweeps Auntie's bonnet from her head. In attempting to regain it, she overbalances herself and falls over a stone wall, landing on her bustle. Upon striking she immediately rebounds and disappears from view. Alighting, she again rebounds and lands safely beside her badly frightened companion. Highly amusing and bound to create laughter.
